Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Belden
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Grand, Central, Fullerton and Austin due to street blockage near Austin/Belden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, Grand, Central, Fullerton and Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Belden.

Allow extra travel time.
